reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 494/92: ZONING AREAS - GEOGRAPHIC TOWNSHIP OF MUTRIE, DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.reg_name_text: ZONING AREAS — GEOGRAPHIC TOWNSHIP OF MUTRIE, DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 494/92: ZONING AREAS - GEOGRAPHIC TOWNSHIP OF MUTRIE, DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. In this Order,  “accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot; “dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants; “seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence; “single dwelling” means a building or structure containing only one dwelling unit occupied or capable of being occupied as a permanent residence or home, and includes a mobile home. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Order,

“accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot;

“dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants;

“seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence;

“single dwelling” means a building or structure containing only one dwelling unit occupied or capable of being occupied as a permanent residence or home, and includes a mobile home. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Order applies to that parcel of land in the geographic Township of Mutrie in the Territorial District of Kenora being composed of part of the south half of broken Lot 10, Concession I, designated as Lots 1 to 13 on Plan 23M-887 registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 494/92, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. This Order applies to that parcel of land in the geographic Township of Mutrie in the Territorial District of Kenora being composed of part of the south half of broken Lot 10, Concession I, designated as Lots 1 to 13 on Plan 23M-887 registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 494/92, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 1 and Lots 3 to 13 except one seasonal dwelling for each lot and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 1 and Lots 3 to 13 except one seasonal dwelling for each lot and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 2 except one single dwelling and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a single dwelling. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 2 except one single dwelling and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a single dwelling. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 4.

content.content: 5. No part of a building except the basement shall be constructed below 1, 193 feet above sea level. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. No part of a building except the basement shall be constructed below 1, 193 feet above sea level. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 5.

content.content: 6. No openings or windows in a basement, or any part of them, shall be constructed below 1,193 feet above sea level. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. No openings or windows in a basement, or any part of them, shall be constructed below 1,193 feet above sea level. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 6.

content.content: 7. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 7 (1). (2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of all or part of any building or structure. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 7 (2).
content.raw_html:
7. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 7 (1).

(2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of all or part of any building or structure. O. Reg. 494/92, s. 7 (2).
